snippet.title: [Undertale: Hard Mode] Wonderful Idea - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
EDIT: Sadly, the comic idea, as well as the Gaster inclusion, have been scrapped, but the Genocide Ending remains in development. Yes, we're aware it's been 2 years — the project's been on hiatus for most of that time for personal reasons.
Further info about Gaster's removal in genocide can be found here: https://gamejolt.com/p/wonderful-idea-devlog-major-progress-updates-previews-and-announ-qvvhz3ig
-
The highly requested Wonderful Idea game adaptation is in the making! We also plan to make a sprite comic with all other routes - stay tuned for more info in the upcoming future! Please read the FAQ in the pinned comment before asking questions!
-
►Follow our Gamejolt for future updates: https://gamejolt.com/games/wonderful_idea/577837
►We also recommend joining the WI Discord server, it contains tons of more information and answers to frequent questions: https://discord.gg/Vmq2rxM
-
Thanks so much to @UNDEREVENT for featuring us in this year's event! We had a blast and hey, we also got the motivation to do a trailer!

⭐Credits:
Wonderful Idea, Music, Writing by MisterKaze
Coding, Trailer by Avranik
Sprites, Designs by Pongy
-
Funny 3D models by Savage Penguin
Co-writing by Pixel-icon15
Extra animation by Sydist
-
Writing help by EllisBros
Gamejolt header by GreenBerry
Gamejolt thumbnail by Daunder
-
Undertale by Toby Fox
Some assets (SFX, Backgrounds) by Toby Fox
-
Music links:
https://soundcloud.com/misterkaze/wonderful-idea-trailer-theme
https://soundcloud.com/misterkaze/wonderful-idea-ruins-follower

🌍My Social Media:
►Discord: MisterKaze Presents (tag: 6751)
►Discord Server: https://discord.gg/K6nvNfy
►SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/misterkaze
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/MisterKaze
►DeviantArt: https://www.deviantart.com/misterkaze

At last, goat father's got his trident again. See you in another half year folks! ❤️

#Undertale #UndertaleAU​​ #Wonderful_Idea #Hardmode
